name: (ALPHA ) Oh My Lord: TOURNAMENT
description:
THE GAME IS MEANT TO BE PLAYED WITH 2 CONTROLLERS

If you do play with a keyboard bear in mind some controls might be a little clunky.

ALPHA BUILD

Any kind of feedback will be greatly appreciated!

"Sneeze your enemy to death and prevail in this battle of the ages"

How to play:

The grey room is the one being disputed.

Crown rooms end the game if reached.

In order to progress, each player must try to kill the other player, then go through the open door.

Player 1 advances to the right

Player 2 advances to the left

Helpers:

The game has three different helpers.

When sneezed, they lend their help to the player that activated them.

The Butler

Shields the player from one shot or sneeze.

Uncle Henry

Shoots mind bullets to the enemy player.

Gold Djhin

Gives the player the ability to fire a barrage of bullets for a short time and renders him unable to move.

This effect can be cancelled at will.

Controls:

We said it above, but the controller is highly recommended.

Controller:

- A = Jump

- X = Sneeze (push the other player, activate npc helpers on the level, reflect enemy shot)

- Left Joystick = Movement

- B = Back button / Get out of helpers

- Start = Pause Menu

Keyboard:

Player 1 (Left):

- Space = Jump

- Q = Sneeze (push the other player, activate npc helpers on the level, reflect enemy shot)

- A/D = Movement

- E = Back button / Get out of helpers

- V = Pause menu

Player 2 (Right):

- N = Jump

- M = sneeze (push the other player, activate npc helpers on the level, reflect enemy shot)

- Left Arrow/Right Arrow = Movement

- B = Back button / Get out of helpers

- P = Pause menu
